# couponCode

**Instance Property**

The initial coupon code for the payment request.

## Declaration

```swift
DOMString couponCode;
```

## Discussion

Set the value to the empty string to indicate that there’s no initial coupon.

## Coupon codes

- **supportsCouponCode**: A Boolean value that determines whether the payment sheet displays the coupon code field.
